title: Beer Tasting Tool Kit - How to Choose and Taste Beer Like a Brew
description:
Beer Tasting Tool Kit: How to Choose and Taste Beer Like a Brewer
by Jeff Alworth

Here's a fun way to discover the nuances of artisan beers from lagers and ales to porters and stouts. Tasting profiles from the booklet get the ball rollingÃ¢â‚¬â€they break down beer into style categories and include information on each variety's background, flavors, aromas, and unique character. Cover the bottles with the paper sleeves to conduct blind tastings, and record tasting notesÃ¢â‚¬â€a world of beer awaits!
